name: Try and survive !
description:
"Try and survive !" is a proceduraly-generated game about a person named Bob , who has waked up in a mysterious land , and has to survive at any cost .

Average playtime : 40 - 75 minutes

There is a tutorial , but if you don't want to use it , here are the controls :

Movement - W , A , S , D

Interaction - LMB

Inventory - E

Map - M , also you can press space to make a waypoint .

Console - T

You can choose a slot in the hotbar by pressing it or pressing the 1-8 buttons . You can also press Q to switch .

Timer - Z

Drop an item - G
